SELECT commentid,time,content,checkindate,checkoutdate,bookingdate, customer.name as name,typename,photo, (DATEDIFF(checkoutdate, checkindate)+1) * price AS price from `comment` LEFT JOIN booking on `comment`.bookingid=booking.bookingid left join customer on booking.customerid=customer.customerid left join room on booking.roomid=room.roomid left join roomtype on room.typeid=roomtype.typeid
and booking.customerid=#{customerid} and customer.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and typename like concat('%',#{typename},'%') and content like concat('%',#{content},'%')
